rules_text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. 
[i]Addendum[/i] – Then it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature you don't control if you cast this spell during your main phase.
_
rules_text2:
Piercing
Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners hands. Opponents can't cast spells that share a name with the returned permanents until your next turn.
